title.native: 金装のヴェルメイユ～崖っぷち魔術師は最強の厄災と魔法世界を突き進む～
title.romaji: Kinsou no Vermeil: Gakeppuchi Majutsushi wa Saikyou no Yakusai to Mahou Sekai wo Tsuki Susumu

description:
Meet Alto, a hapless student at Royal Ortigia Magic Academy whose academic performance leaves much to be desired. Rather than take a more sensible approach to salvaging his grades in time for graduation, Alto decides to summon a bit of otherworldly assistance. Only after does he learn he’s bound the legendary she-devil Vermeil into service as his familiar! But while Vermeil is a powerful ally sure to turn his grades around, her magic can only be replenished with a kiss, and that makes everything go to hell with Alto’s jealous childhood friend, Lilia.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)
synonyms: Vermeil in Gold: A Desperate Magician Barges Into the Magical World Alongside the Strongest Calamity
เวอร์มีลแห่งเวทสีทอง: นักอาคมหวิดซิ่วกับอสูรรับใช้สุดแกร่งบุกตะลุยโลกเวทมนตร์
Vermeil in Gold - Il mago a rischio bocciatura e la calamità più forte si fanno strada nel mondo della magia

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Succubus
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a succubus, a creature in medieval folklore that typically uses their sexual prowess to trap and seduce people to feed off them.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: MILF
tags.description: Features sexual intercourse with older women.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

node.description:
Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)
Tomomi Umetsu is a Japanese director, episode director and editor.

__Height:__ 153cm

[Profile (Style Cube)](http://stylecube.jp/talents/kaori/index.html) | [Website](http://ishiharakaori.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaori_staff_) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/ishiharakaori/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ishiharakaori_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kaori_ishihara)

She won the award of Best Rookie Actress in the 7th Seiyuu Awards. She was a founding member of the group [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177), before her graduation from the group on April 20, 2013. She was one half of J-Pop duo [YuiKaori](https://anilist.co/staff/195974/), along with [Yui Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105981/) before the group disbanded in 2017.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Frima - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Soldier EG - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Tiara - Fairy Fencer F (VG)

__[Website](http://projectmili.com)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ProjectMili)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/projectmili/)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ProjectMili)__ | __[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/ProjectMili)__

Indie band “Mili” consists of: Canadian vocalist [Cassie Wei](https://anilist.co/staff/188041/Cassie-Wei), capable of writing lyrics in three languages. Composer and arranger [Yamato Kasai](https://anilist.co/staff/168859), with a proven track record of providing music to various artists, such as Higuchi Ai, DAOKO, and Hanazawa Kana. Bassist [Yukihito Mitomo](https://anilist.co/staff/189705/Yukihito-Mitomo) and drummer [Shoto Yoshida](https://anilist.co/staff/189704/Shoto-Yoshida) are long-time musicians who have gone through both indie and major debuts. Animator, illustrator, and character designer [Ao Fujimori](https://anilist.co/staff/159213/Ao-Fujimori), an experienced animation director, is in charge of Mili's visual artwork.

Mili has written music for popular anime and game titles such as "Ghost in the Shell", "Goblin Slayer", "Limbus Company", "Library of Ruina", "ENDER LILIES", and "Promise of Wizard". They create music in various genres, such as classical, electronic, rock, and jazz, while maintaining a high level of quality. They handle music, visual art, merchandise, management, and business all by themselves. Mili is fully in control of their production and is recognized as a unique presence both domestically and internationally.

They are also producing many songs for anime, game, and IT companies in Japan, Korea, China, Canada, and Poland.

(Source: Spotify, edited)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/itoken438)__

__Birthplace:__ Mie Prefecture, Japan

__Ken Itou__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

Affiliated with [APDREAM](https://anilist.co/studio/6572/APDREAM).

_Note: Not to be confused with [山田航平](https://anilist.co/staff/296698/Kouhei-Yamada)._
